SEARCH
Package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands

Class RenewBook

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands.RenewBook
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class RenewBook extends Object implements Command
The RenewBook class represents a command to renew a book by a patron. It allows extending the due date for a book that is currently on loan to a patron.

      public RenewBook(int patronId, int bookId)
      Constructs a RenewBook command.
      Parameters:
      patronId - ID of the patron renewing the book.
      bookId - ID of the book to be renewed.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(Library library, LocalDate currentDate, MessageDisplayer messageDisplayer) throws LibraryException
      Executes the renew book command. It allows a patron to renew a book if they have borrowed it and it is currently on loan to them.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Command
      Parameters:
      library - The library where the book and patron data is managed.
      currentDate - The current date.
      messageDisplayer - The message displayer for displaying messages (supports both GUI and CLI).
      Throws:
      LibraryException - if any validation fails during the renewing process.
